shows.title: A Man Worth Killing
shows.plot_overview: After a series of brutal murders, and orders from The Big Boss, two callous and cold killers continue their bloodshed, only wanting to eliminate a weak old man, who is actually their biggest obstacle, but also a great threat to their unscrupulous plan.

shows.title: Своя в доску
shows.plot_overview: A strict physics teacher tries to dissuade her teenage son from leaving school and becoming a professional skateboarder. She makes a bet with him that if he competes in a major skateboarding competition, he will stay in school. Under the guidance of her failing student, she learns to skate, unaware that she is putting her career and reputation at risk.
